2. Applicant under 12 years old must register a legal guardian, who must also be a member.

Please Select the Nearest Area to Your Mailing Address

1. The reservation number consists of six English letters or digits.

 2. If there is more than one passenger in your reservation number, please enter only one of the passenger name.

• Since January 12th, 2009 all Visa Waiver Program travelers must apply and be pre-approved to travel to the US using the Electronic System for Travel Authorization (ESTA). Passengers who plan to enter the US using the Visa Waiver Program will not be permitted to board their flight unless their details have been registered with the ESTA website. We would like to remind you that applications may take up to 72 hours.

• Special meal or special service like wheelchair is not offered at eCheck-In process. Please request so when you make reservation before eCheck-In process or you can ask for assistance at the airport check-in counter if you have completed eCheck-In procedures.

 • Currently, eCheck-In service is available for CI international flights(except Code-share flights operated by other airlines) passengers up to 9 persons in the same booking record from 48 hours up to 1.5 hours prior to the flight departure time.

 • eCheck-In service is not available for passengers with I/P/G class bookings.

 • If you are not eligible to enjoy Self-Print Boarding Pass service and Mobile Boarding Pass service, please pick up boarding pass or check in baggage (if any) at least around 1 to 2 hours prior to the flight departure time (Please refer to the notice of eCheck-In Print function webpage) at the airport (you may contact eCheck-In counter directly at counter B of KHH Airport) to comply with the immigration's inspection and security check procedures.

 • Passengers less than 18 years old departing from Rome and traveling alone are not eligible to enjoy our eCheck-In service due to the local government regulations.

Important Notice.\n •VIP Lounge Vouchers is not refundable and change date after initial purchase.

Notice for Ticket Collection:
 ● When collecting tickets, please present ID number (foreign passengers please provide passport number) used for booking, and the reservation number 40 minutes prior to the departure time of your train. Tickets can be collected from partnering convenience stores (extra fee of NTD10 per ticket), Ticket Window or the ticket vending machine at any THSR station during opening hours.
 ● For any issues, please contact THSR customer serivce hotline 412-9000 (mobile: 02-4129000).
You are eligible for mileage redemption
Update my email to my personal details

1. If you traveled on a China Airlines/Mandarin Airlines operated flight within the last 6 months and did not credit your miles, please apply to reclaim your mileage. Only tickets issued by CI/AE starting with ticket number 297/803 will be accepted.
2. Because boarding record for each flight requires time for update, application on the same day as flight departure may not be accepted.

3. If your booking name is different from your name shown on the membership card and you will not be able to reclaim your mileage successfully online. Please provide boarding pass, electronic or paper ticket receipt, photocopy of your passport with the alias name (also known as) is required for identity verification and contact our local Member Service Hotline (https://www.china-airlines.com/us/en/member/member-service-hotline) to correct mileage.
4. Please keep your electronic or paper ticket receipt and boarding pass until the mileage has been credited to your account.

5. Tickets sold at discounts of 50% or more, free ticket, award ticket with X/Z/O booking class, infant ticket, group ticket with G booking class, promotional ticket with S/L/X booking class, labor ticket, barter ticket, charter ticket, excess baggage ticket, and airline and travel industry discount tickets are excluded from flight mileage accumulation.
6. Valid claim for missing miles will be credited to member\'s account within 4 weeks.
A valid claim for missing miles will be credited to the member\'s account within 4 weeks.
You have been credited with %1$s miles for %4$s (%2$s-%3$s)

For membership upgrade and renewal, every member needs to accrue at least 6 weighted trips from China Airlines (CI) / Mandarin Airlines (AE) self-operated scheduled international flights, and at least one of "Accumulated Miles", "Qualified Business Class Flights" or "Weighted Trips" should reach respective qualification. If above qualification is reached, membership will be upgraded on the 1st of next month; membership will be renewed on the next day of current membership\'s expiration date.
Business class trip counts accrual is valid on self-operated international flights of China Airlines and Mandarin Airlines only.
This QR code contains your membership card details
Congratulations! You are eligible for membership renewal.
Congratulations! You are eligible for membership advancement.

Travel Permit of Taiwan Residents To and From Mainland

1. Baggage tracking is only available for passengers who are departing from Taoyuan/Seoul/Singapore/Frankfurt/New York/San Francisco/Vancouver and have completed flight and baggage check-in at the designated counter.

 2. Tracking available only within 3 days of flight arrival.

 3. All baggage activity is shown in the local time of the airport location.

 4. If your itinerary includes travel on airlines other than China Airlines or its connection flight carriers, baggage tracking information for those flights may not be available. Please check with the operating carrier for your baggage status.

* Reservation Number：A combination of 6 alpha-numeric characters.(eg.000000)

 * Baggage Tag Number ：A 2-letter airline code + a 6-digit number combination.(eg.CI123456)
Authorization is required to access your camera. Please go to settings on your device to enable bag tag scanning service.
